attributes.action: please allow all retired Gurka's no matter when they served to reside in our counrty. And give them the same pension rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As an ex serviceman who has served in many countries including the far east namely Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaya, and Korea the list goes on. But during  my service in the far east, it was a pleasure and an honour to serve with these gallant men we all know as the Gurka rifles. And its high time this government or any future government gave them the right to live here in the country  they have served so well for so many years. Come on Mr Brown get your act together along with your cabinet and allow these men the same rights as i enjoy by being a  british citizen. Ex sergeant british Army.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
